name: Prize Pumpkin TD
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 51!

This year's pumpkin is the biggest you've ever seen....but the ants are here to eat it!

Defend your pumpkin by planting flowers!

Gain gold by killing ants, then use gold to buy flowers, water, or ice

Flowers grow in real time and have different abilities as they grow

Water or freeze flowers to change how fast they grow

HOW TO PLAY

Ants spawn from anthills and must be defeated before they reach the pumpkin.

Click on the different tabs to do different things:

Plant tab: Select it and then click on the map to place a plant.

Water tab: Select it and then click on a plant to speed up its growth.

Ice tab: Select it and then click on a plant to pause its growth.
